feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report with an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend components and files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH CSS variables for theme colors and utilities.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout rendering header, CTA buttons, feature cards, and footer.
frontend/src/components/NextLevel/CtaBut: CTA buttons linking to SAMP server and Discord with styled Button components.
frontend/src/components/NextLevel/Footer: Footer with dynamic year and Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/NextLevel/Header: Centered page header displaying the site title with glow animation.
frontend/src/components/NextLevel/Server: Component that simulates checking and displays server status as ONLINE.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth, login, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query backend hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base plus custom OKLCH navy/cyan theme and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap wiring React Query, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extended with OKLCH theming, utilities, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and current state for building a responsive landing page with CTA buttons, status logic, and themed UI. Lists existing features, pending requests, and architectural notes for the “Next Level RP” site.
